ygData.subject: Re: New armor info
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm...what is the trivial level for Footwarming Boots?  They may be the missing link.  If they are higher than aqualungs (148) and more economical than
ygData.messageBody:
Hmm...what is the trivial level for Footwarming Boots? They may be
the missing link. If they are higher than aqualungs (148) and more
economical than rebreathers, then they could help boost skill for all
of us tinkerers that are on a budget. Can someone post what they
have found on the boot's trivial level? Also, can someone past 148
make some boots to see if they increase skill about the same or
better than rebreathers?

This will help me a bunch in trying to put together a training plan.
Might also help someone increase their skill to the point where they
can make at least one piece of Watchman armor.

I just want to know if Watchman armor is going to be worthwhile or
not. I hope they give it decent AC and we don't have the
mysteriously disappearing AC like we do for rebreathers. But we
won't know until someone makes it. Sigh...

Thanks for the info in advance.
Norbert


--- In EQ_Tinkering@egroups.com, Madgrizzle <MadGrizzle@w...> wrote:
> Was afraid of that.. 26 attempts and no increases. I might make
> footwarming boots before I would do rebreathers perhaps. At least
I can
> raise my blacksmithing skills.
>
> At 02:21 PM 12/20/2000 -0600, you wrote:
> > To be completely honest with you, I am going back to
rebreathers to
> >raise the skill. I did not gain a single skill point in the 26
failures,
> >and average about one skill point per 6-8 rebreather attempts.
